huffman

Class HuffmanCoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • huffman.HuffmanCoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Coder

    public class HuffmanCoder
extends java.lang.Object
implements Coder
    Implements the Huffman coding and writes the compressed file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String[] codes
      A string array where the index represents the character/byte, and the value represents the huffman code of the character/byte.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HuffmanCoder(int alphabetSize)
      Initializes byteFrequencies and codes.
      HuffmanCoder(int[] frequencies, int alphabetSize)
      Used for testing to insert the byte frequencies.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buildCodeList(HuffmanTree tree, java.lang.StringBuffer prefix)
      Builds an array of characters and their corresponding Huffman codes
      HuffmanTree buildTree()
      Builds the Huffman tree by combining the least frequent trees until the tree is complete.
      void compress(FileInput in, FileOutput out)
      Run the Huffman coding algorithm and write the compressed file.
      void generateByteFrequencies(FileInput in)
      Reads through the whole file and generates a list of the frequencies of all unique characters/bytes in the file.
      void initEndOfFileCharacterFrequency()
      0 = NUL, used as the end of file character.
      void writeCompressedContent(FileInput in, FileOutput out)
      Reads the source file and writes the compressed destination file using huffman codes.
      void writeTree(FileOutput out, HuffmanTree root)
      First the structure of the tree is written, ending with the output at the beginning of the next byte.
      void writeTreeLeaves(FileOutput out, HuffmanTree tree)
      Traverses the tree in pre-order and writes leaf values, one value/leaf per byte.
      void writeTreeStructure(FileOutput out, HuffmanTree tree)
      Traverses the tree in pre-order and writes 0 for leaf, 1 for internal node.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • codes

        public java.lang.String[] codes
        A string array where the index represents the character/byte, and the value represents the huffman code of the character/byte.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HuffmanCoder

        public HuffmanCoder(int alphabetSize)
        Initializes byteFrequencies and codes.
        Parameters:
        alphabetSize - size of the alphabet, or how many unique characters there can be.

      • HuffmanCoder

        public HuffmanCoder(int[] frequencies,
                    int alphabetSize)
        Used for testing to insert the byte frequencies.
        Parameters:
        frequencies - frequencies of the characters
        alphabetSize - size of the alphabet

    • Method Detail

      • compress

        public void compress(FileInput in,
                     FileOutput out)
        Run the Huffman coding algorithm and write the compressed file. Writes the Huffman tree first and then the compressed content.
        Specified by:
        compress in interface Coder

      • initEndOfFileCharacterFrequency

        public void initEndOfFileCharacterFrequency()
        0 = NUL, used as the end of file character. Frequency is once at the end of the file.

      • generateByteFrequencies

        public void generateByteFrequencies(FileInput in)
        Reads through the whole file and generates a list of the frequencies of all unique characters/bytes in the file.
        Parameters:
        in - reads the file, and at the end is resetToBeginning to the beginning

      • writeCompressedContent

        public void writeCompressedContent(FileInput in,
                                   FileOutput out)
        Reads the source file and writes the compressed destination file using huffman codes.
        Parameters:
        in - reads the file
        out - writes the file

      • writeTree

        public void writeTree(FileOutput out,
                      HuffmanTree root)
        First the structure of the tree is written, ending with the output at the beginning of the next byte. Then the leaf values are written, one value per byte.
        Parameters:
        out - FileOutput for the bits.
        root - Root of the tree to be written.

      • writeTreeStructure

        public void writeTreeStructure(FileOutput out,
                               HuffmanTree tree)
        Traverses the tree in pre-order and writes 0 for leaf, 1 for internal node.
        Parameters:
        out - FileOutput for the bits.
        tree - subtree to be written and traversed

      • writeTreeLeaves

        public void writeTreeLeaves(FileOutput out,
                            HuffmanTree tree)
        Traverses the tree in pre-order and writes leaf values, one value/leaf per byte.
        Parameters:
        out - FileOutput for the bytes.
        tree - subtree to be written and traversed

      • buildTree

        public HuffmanTree buildTree()
        Builds the Huffman tree by combining the least frequent trees until the tree is complete.
        Returns:
        the root of the tree

      • buildCodeList

        public void buildCodeList(HuffmanTree tree,
                          java.lang.StringBuffer prefix)
        Builds an array of characters and their corresponding Huffman codes
        Parameters:
        tree - complete Huffman tree
        prefix - initializes the prefix/code
